page.content: and 271 of these are one man bus drivers which means that these drivers do the tickets as well,and people pay at the front of the bus.There are 243 conductors,51 are women.There are 7 women drivers.When we asked the men what they thought of women drivers and conductors, they said it was a very good idea and they couldn't get enough of them. When we interviewed a bus driver he said:The job is split into shifts,a short is 7 hours,a long shift is 8 hours.A driver on a early shift gets paid less than a driver on a late shift.On each shift they make about 4-5 journies(depending on the length of the routes).A bus driver is never on the same shift,they always alternate from long to short shifts.A 214 arrives at the bus station every 12-13 minutes and there are 8 buses on the route.A bus
